repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:jessie 
MAINTAINER Marek Bart√≠k <bartimar6 at gmail.com> 
RUN apt-get update && \  
apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends steghide && \  
apt-get clean autoclean && \  
apt-get autoremove -y --purge && \
rm -rf /var/lib/{apt,dpkg,cache,log}/ && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ENTRYPOINT ["steghide"]
